channel.title: Hugo on Portfolio site
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on Portfolio site

item.title: Portfolio website
item.description: This very page that I built from scratch using HUGO. It was an idea I had for a while that was pushed forward due to an assignment requirement. It is still in its early stage most notably lacking responsiveness and higher level of polish. Still WiP as I plan to improve and add to it to improve workflow.
